p:
The 12 most active compounds as defined by OPLS analysis were identified by (i) GC retention indices (RI), (ii) computer matching with commercial mass spectral libraries (NIST 98 MS, ADAMS)
50 , (iii) comparisons of RI and spectra with those from previous work
31, 51 and an in-house library of analyses of commercial EOs of known composition (Aroma-Zone), and (iv) confirmation by comparison with identifications provided in the literature.
